unnormalised: Col. Sharma retired after 30 yrs of service, but even after retirement, everyone still calls him Col. Sahab. It's just a sign of respect, you know, like how they used to address Gen. Thimayya back in the day.
normalised: Colonel Sharma retired after thirty years of service, but even after retirement, everyone still calls him Colonel Sahab. It's just a sign of respect, you know, like how they used to address General Thimayya back in the day.
